text: Pogonocherus fasciculatus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Charles De Geer in 1775, originally under the genus Cerambyx. It has a wide distribution throughout Europe.BioLib.cz - Pogonocherus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==Subspecies== * Pogonocherus fasciculatus fasciculatus (DeGeer, 1775) * Pogonocherus fasciculatus hondoensis Ohbayashi, 1963 ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1775
title: Pogonocherus fasciculatus
